title: Bug 124067: Relative path not supported when selecting XML file
description: When selecting an XML file, the system should support relative paths.
OB: Currently, only absolute paths are supported when selecting an XML file.
EB: The system should support both relative and absolute paths when selecting an XML file.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a new report.
2. Select an XML file.
3. Verify that the file path used is relative, not absolute.
